sentences.en: Her job ordinarily consisted of five days a week at FBI headquarters.
sentences.cn: 她每周在联邦调查局总部上5天班.

sentences.en: Mr. Slope's civility had been more than ordinarily greasy.
sentences.cn: 斯洛普先生的礼仪比平日更为谄媚.

sentences.en: Ordinarily I fly to an assignment like this and rent a car.
sentences.cn: 平常在这种情况下我都乘飞机去,在当地租一辆车.

sentences.en: Ordinarily it would be fun to be taken to fabulous restaurants.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，跟别人去豪华餐馆吃饭会是件乐事。

sentences.en: Ordinarily It'should be snowing at this time of the year.
Ordinarily she sleeps at the school and goes home only on Saturdays.
sentences.cn: 她平时住在学校,星期六才回家.

sentences.en: Ordinarily the men found it hard to talk to the women.
sentences.cn: 平时,男人们总觉得很难和妇女们交谈.

sentences.en: Ordinarily, he didn’t like to go to the movies.
sentences.cn: 一般来说他不喜欢去看电影。

sentences.en: Ordinarily, this would tend to drive the price down.
sentences.cn: 通常, 这样会使价格下降.

sentences.en: Ordinarily, tightening supplies and increased demand would cause upward pressure on prices.
sentences.cn: 通常, 供应紧张和需求增长会迫使价格上升.

sentences.en: Similar arrangements apply to students who are ordinarily resident in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 类似的安排适用于长期居住在苏格兰的学生。

sentences.en: Such accommodations would ordinarily cost a hundred dollars a week.
sentences.cn: 配有这些设施的房间通常的价格是每周100块钱.

sentences.en: Surging is ordinarily associated with separation and re - attachment in the diffuser.
sentences.cn: 喘振通常与气流在扩散段内的分离和再附相联系.

sentences.en: The streets would ordinarily have been full of people. There was no one.
sentences.cn: 街上通常应该人满为患，当时却空无一人。

sentences.en: This is not the price at which the CD is ordinarily sold.
sentences.cn: 这不是这张CD平时卖的价格。

sentences.en: To the untrained eye, the children were behaving ordinarily.
sentences.cn: 在外行人眼里，这些孩子表现正常。

sentences.en: We ordinarily characterize an action as responsible if it was intended.
sentences.cn: 如果行为是有意的,我们一般将其特征归为应负责任的.

trans.tran_cn: 平常地，通常地，一般地，按说
